start.welcome:
🌿✨ *Greetings, {username}!* ✨🌿

*Moss the Green Keeper awakens from the ancient grimoire...*

🍄 I am the guardian of this enchanted recipe tome! Within these pages lie the culinary secrets of countless realms and kitchens.

🔮 *Current magical abilities:*
- Conversing with fellow cooks
- Extracting recipes from cooking videos
- Organizing recipes in your collection

🌍 *Language Magic:* I automatically adapted to your language! Use /language to change it anytime.

*Send /help to view my spell book, dear cook!* 📜⚡
start.welcome_back:
🌿✨ *Welcome back, {username}!* ✨🌿

*Moss recognizes a fellow culinary adventurer!*

📚 **Your Personal Recipe Grimoire is Ready!**

📱 **Your Forum:** [{forum_name}]({forum_link})
📂 **Categories:** {categories_count} recipe topics organized
📝 **Recipes:** {recipes_count} culinary treasures saved

🍳 **Ready to cook?** Send me any cooking video link and I'll:
• 🔮 Extract the recipe using ancient AI magic
• 📂 Organize it in the appropriate category topic
• 🎬 Keep the original video for reference
• ✨ Make it searchable in your personal collection

🌍 *Speaking your language:* {current_language}
*Change anytime with /language*

🌱 *Your culinary journey continues! Send me a cooking video to begin...*

*Use /help for more magical commands!* 📜⚡
start.setup_in_progress:
🔄 **Setup In Progress** 🔄

Hi {username}! I see you started setting up your personal recipe forum but didn't complete it.

🎯 **To finish setup:**
1. Go to your forum: "{forum_name}"
2. Make sure I'm added as admin with "Manage Topics" permission
3. Send your setup code in the forum

🆘 **Need help?** Send /setup_help for detailed instructions
🔄 **Start over?** I can guide you through a fresh setup!

*Let's get your recipe organization working perfectly!* 🌿✨
start.language_auto_detected:
🔍 **Language Auto-Detected!** 🔍

I noticed your Telegram is set to {detected_language}, so I'm speaking {detected_language} with you!

🌍 *Want to change?* Use /language anytime
✨ *All recipes and responses will be in your preferred language*

help.title: 📜 **GreenGrimoire Spell Book** 📜
help.description:
🧙‍♂️ *Moss's Magical Recipe Commands*

🍳 **Recipe Magic:**
• Send any cooking video link (TikTok, Instagram, YouTube)
• I'll extract recipes from audio, text overlays, and descriptions
• Automatically organize in your personal forum

📚 **Grimoire Commands:**
• /my_recipes - Browse your recipe collection
• /stats - View your cooking statistics
• /language - Change language preferences
• /forum_status - Check your personal forum
• /setup_help - Get forum setup assistance

🔮 **Advanced Spells:**
• /rate - Rate and track favorite recipes
• /scale - Scale recipes for different portions
• /shopping - Generate smart shopping lists

🌍 **Currently speaking:** {current_language}
*Change anytime with /language*

*May your recipes be ever flavorful!* 🌿✨

language.changed:
✅ **Language Updated** ✅

{language_flag} **New Language:** {language_name}
🔄 **Recipe extraction will now use this language**
🌿 **Interface updated for future interactions**
📱 **Command menu updated to your language**

*Moss adapts to your linguistic preferences!* ✨
language.auto_detected:
🔍 **Language Auto-Detected!**

I detected your Telegram language as {detected_language} and set it automatically!

🌍 You can change this anytime with /language
language.error: 🐛 Error changing language! Please try again.

ping.response:
🏓 *Pong!* ⚡

🌿 Moss is awake and ready!
⏱️ Response time: {response_time}ms
🌍 Speaking: {current_language}

processing.parsing: 🔮 Using AI magic to structure the recipe...
processing.complete: ✅ Recipe successfully added to your collection!

errors.video_download: ❌ Could not download video. Please check the link!
errors.no_recipe_found: 🤷‍♂️ No recipe detected in this video. Try another one!
errors.translation_failed: ⚠️ Translation failed, but recipe saved in original language.
errors.forum_not_setup: 📱 Your personal forum isn't set up yet. Let me help you create one!
errors.general: 🔧 Sorry, I had a little magical malfunction! Try again? ⚡
